articles.title: 15 Years Of 'Call Of Duty' Campaigns Did Not Prepare Me For 'Civil War' - Forbes
articles.description: I kept thinking about Call of Duty, and adjacently, The Division, as I watched Alex Garland’s Civil War last night, which takes that concept of a war-torn America to t...
articles.content:
Civil War
A24
Call of Duty has dipped in and out of its modern-era warzone campaigns for almost 20 years now since the release of the original Modern Warfare in 2007. Among those games are frequent… [+3106 chars]
